§ 146. Authorization of appropriations For the purposes of this chapter, there are authorized to be appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, sums of not more than $50,000 for any one fiscal year. (Added Oct. 31, 1951, ch. 655, § 12, 65 Stat. 715.)
